landingDescriptionHeadline: THE INTERACTIVE WEB DOCUMENTARY OF THE SINGING STREET VENDORS OF MEDELLÍN - COLOMBIA.
landingDescriptionParagraph: A virtual journey to discover the world of those who have understood that in trade as in love, it is the voice that seduces.
tutorialFirstStreetHelper1Description: Clicking on the name of the street vendor, visualize one of the video about his life.
tutorialFirstStreetHelper2Description: One video is little to know all the facets of Jale. There's more ! Look for her in other streets !
tutorialFirstStreetHelper3Description: There are other street vendors in the streets. Find them. It's your turn to explore!
tutorialDirectUnlockDescription: To unlock, find again the street vendor. You can go directly or look for him in other streets of the city.
askToCreateAccountDescription: Do you want to save your progress? Your progress will be automatically syncronized. If you need to leave the web-doc, you'll be able to start again from where you left it.
successAccountCreationDescription: Perfect! Your progress will be automatically syncronized during your journey. If you need to leave the web-doc, you'll be able to start again from where you left it.
alertBeforeLogoutDescription: Are you sure you want to log out and start from the beginning ?
signInDoNotHaveAnAccount: I do not have an account.
successSignInDescription2: , your previous progress have been retrieved and you can continue from where you left.
shareDescription: Do you like the experience ? Share it with your friends !
shareTweetContent: Nadie había mostrado así a los pregoneros de Medellín. Documental interactivo, buenísimo. Mirá aquí: http://www.pregonerosdemedellin.com
shareEmailObject: Te va a gustar! Pregoneros de Medellín.
shareEmailContent: Nadie había mostrado así a los pregoneros de Medellín. Un documental interactivo! Buenísimo. Mirá aquí: http://www.pregonerosdemedellin.com
tutorialShortCutMapDescription: Do you want to go directly in this street ?
